headline: Why AMD Stock Jumped Today
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) stock recorded another day of strong gains Thursday.  Amid a 2% jump for the S&P 500 and a 2.7% rally for the Nasdaq Composite, the semiconductor specialist's share price closed out the day up 4.5%.  AMD stock moved higher today as investors bought back into the broader market on reports that the U.S. is making moves to lower trade war tensions with other economic leaders.
